decision_conditions: Pursuant to The Town and Country Planning (General Development Procedure) (amendment No 3) (England) Order 2009, the revisions as detailed in the Cover Letter, Internal Daylight and Sunlight Report, PL_103_05, PL_104_05, PL_105_05 and PL_220_05 are considered not to be materially different from the approved plans and may therefore be implemented without the need for further planning permission.
description: Non material amendment to approved application DM2024/01404 which allowed the 'Prior Approval in relation to the erection of 2 new floors to provide 10 self contained residential units and provision of waste storage,' to allow for one of the approved floors to be within the roofspace, to reduce the number of residential units proposed from 10 to 7 and to change the approved description to 'Erection of 2 new floors (with one floor contained within the roofspace) to provide 7 self-contained residential units and provison of waste storage'.
